page.title: 10TRANSPORT
page.content: Within the Trull and Staplehay area, there are 8{regular bus services}to the main county town _ Taunton _ a day,from Monday to Friday.This takes a quarter of an hour, but people are still{dissatisfied}with the service. Many people use{private transport}, owning on average two cars per family. The lanes around the area tend to be narrow and winding, with high hedges and few passing points. There are few pedestrian paths, making it{unsafe}for walkers, especially for parents with young children.Serious accidents have occurred,and heavy traffic has made parents living by the road especially wary; one household with young children have had to place a large gate on their premises for safety reasons.{
